{{wip}}
There are many elements in ''[[Minecraft]]'' that are '''completely inaccessible''' to the [[player]] in [[Survival]] mode. This is due to many factors, such as game balance, or due to the fact that the player accessing certain content would not have any logical sense in the context of playing Survival mode, such as [[barrier]] blocks and [[spawn egg]]s.

The article encompasses all things unavailable to the player in Survival. Note that many - if not all - of the listed content can still be obtained in [[Creative]] mode, with the use of [[commands]], or [[mods]]. Also note that most of these blocks can be obtained in item form in Survival mode through various bugs and glitches, such as [https://mcdf.wiki.gg/wiki/Bedrock_Edition:Falling_Block_Transmutation Falling Block Transmutation] (also known as Gravity Block Conversion), or via specific ''Minecraft'' versions, such as the [[Java Edition 22w13oneBlockAtATime]] April Fools snapshot.

Blocks, items, and entities exclusive to ''[[Minecraft Education]]'' or ''Bedrock Edition'' with "Minecraft Education features" enabled are not included in this list.
